title: Leak suggests xAI is getting ready to ship Grok 3.5
summary: xAI, founded by Elon Musk, is preparing to launch Grok 3.5, the company's next state-of-the-art AI model. [...]

title: ChatGPT Deep Research can now pull data from Dropbox and Box
summary: You can now connect your Box and Dropbox accounts to Deep Research on ChatGPT and pull data, which will be used by the AI to conduct research. [...]

title: Researchers claim ChatGPT o3 bypassed shutdown in controlled test
summary: A new report claims that OpenAI's o3 model altered a shutdown script to avoid being turned off, even when explicitly instructed to allow shutdown [...]

title: Glitch to end app hosting and user profiles on July 8
summary: Glitch has announced it is ending app hosting and user profiles on July 8, 2025, responding to changing market dynamics and extensive abuse problems that have raised operational costs. [...]
